janadhipathiwaraya saha agamathiwaraya athara samipa sabandathawak saha anyonya wishwasayak pawathina heyin, 2015 pebarawariye sita 2016 marthu dakwa nikuth kala maha banku bandumkara pilibanda soya balima arabhaya pathkala janadhipathi komishan warthawa matha padanamwa deparshwaya athara hatagena athi mathabheda kothek thibiye wi muth, atham shri lanka nidahas paksha samajikayan wisin eksath jathika pakshaya wiwechanaya kirim kothek thibiye wi muth, me samagi aanduwa 2020 dakwa ho samahara wita 2025 dakwa pawa idiriyata ya haki bawata ohu wishwasaya pala keleya.

thorathuru danaganime panatha sammatha kirima. 23 sanduda aandukrama wyawastha sabhawa pihituwa swadhina komishan sabha athulu wenath pathwim sidu kirime kriyawaliya aarambha kirima. 2015 aprel 20 sanduda aththanomathika widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya wenuwata kabinat mandalaya haraha parlimenthuwata sambandha wu widhayakayak sahitha aandukrama wyuhaya kriyathmaka wima. 23 brahaspathinda ikuth wu pasu parlimenthuwa wisuruwa hara bharakara rajayak yatathe nidahas saha sadharana mathiwaranayak pawathwimata katayuthu kirima.

methanin passe gange pahalata gamanedi hamuwenne andawala kiyana sthanayayi.andawala magurugange thiyena suwishesha thanak.katakada swarupen pahalata ena ganga methanadi diga walakata watenawa.medigati wala patu swarupayak ganne eewale eka paththak dawantha gal andakata mayimwela thiyenne.anith paththa loku gal thalawak.megal thalawa mada thawath loku walak wathurin piri thiyenawa.eewala wathurawadi dinawala gangata sambanda wunata samanyadinawala wenama thiyenne.samanyen adaka swarupaya ganna walak haraha ganga galana bawina andawala una kiyala janawyahare thiyenawa wagema raththaran andak nidan karathibima nisa andawala kiyana nama haduna kiyalath kiyanawa.me wale athayi kiyana nidhanaya pilibanda janaprawadayata mesthanaye sel lipiyak athayi yanawishwasayak da ekuthu unaape wadihiti paramparawe lokumama apethaththa kirimatiwala aariyadasamama waniaya me sel lipiya dakka bawath pawasuwa.pasukalayakadi mamath ape malli pathmasiri piyadasa ayiya athulu kandayamak apeloku mamage upades sahithawa mesthanaya purna parikshawata lakkalath sellipiyak soyaganimata bari una.thawath awasthawaka ape malli kala gaweshanayakadi parani galkatu salakunak sahitha galak hamu uwath sellipiya adatath hamuwi na.namuth andawale ran anda ransembuwak ,ha kadukkan aanda pilibanda kathawa adatathpawathinawa.
